description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d8l8q","text":"This protocol describes the required steps to generate Illumina SampleSheet and provides guidelines for sharing data via BaseSpace with FDA for the 2021 Pilot Exercise ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bkgkb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"431tp","text":"V2:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs65r","text":"- added more details regarding data transfer through BaseSpace, including steps for sharing a project with FDA-CFSAN. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2h6a","text":"- replaced samplesheet example.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"kk37","text":"Create your SampleSheet using Excel or a text editor.  Name your sample sheet according your internal protocols, and use a *.csv extension.       The sample sheet is organized in sections titled Header, Reads, Settings and Data.  Section headings are case-sensitive and shown in brackets [ ].  Details for each section are described below. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":143,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fn7ur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"AA88C230539311ECA7E387F0F4ACBE87","id":190034,"original_name":"SampleSheet.csv","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f3uu9zje.csv"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b79gn","text":"If a new library or sequencing protocol is utilized for processing the pilot exercise samples, make the changes in the corresponding parameters for the sequencing sample sheet.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2p2n","text":"Starting your MiSeq run and connecting to BaseSpace:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":52}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7j7ok","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a8r6l","text":"When you set up the run on the MiSeq, select the option to log in to BaseSpace.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1463","text":"Click the Runs tab in the Illumina BaseSpace website .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e45ui","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bdf4c","text":"Select the run that you would like to share with the FDA LFFM wastewater project team.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fi4db","text":"Go to the summary tab and click at the share button.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8igqn","text":"Enter the email address for the FDA team (covidtrakr@fda.hhs.gov), and then click Add Collaborator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqg6p","text":"Click Save Settings. Your run will be automatically shared with the FDA LFFM wastewater project team.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"59dv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5nhki","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"c4lqp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ff7dc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9qfpj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"2AEB8420470111EC9A0B3B649AE5CF86","height":648,"id":190038,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4ntd9","text":"Figure 1: Sharing data via BaseSpace by Email Invitation","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screen Shot 2021-11-16 at 12.16.37 PM.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f3u29zje.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f3uy9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f3uz9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f3ux9zje.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a1h26","text":"Click the Projects tab in the Illumina BaseSpace website .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl2uq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u3d3","text":"Select the project that you would like to share with the FDA LFFM wastewater project team.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"am0ek","text":"Enter the email address for the FDA team (covidtrakr@fda.hhs.gov), and then click Add Collaborator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ff758","text":"Click Save Settings. Your project will be automatically shared with the FDA LFFM wastewater project team.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
